Description: Temptation of St Antony Abbot, from an album lettered "STUDIO/DI DISSEGNI/DI GIACOMO/PALMA" on the front cover, containing 136 drawings of mainly religious subjects; three semi-nude women attacking the saint who sits on the ground to right Pen and brown ink, and grey-brown wash, heightened with white (partly oxidised), over black chalk, on buff paper
Associated names: Representation of: St Antony of Egypt
Previous owner: Previous owner/ex-collection: Antonio Maria Zanetti I
